message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $140. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I understand that $130 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $135. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to consider a price of $132.50?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $134. This is my last offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to consider a price of $133?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $134, Bob. I've already given you a good deal, and I'm not willing to sacrifice my profit margin any further. If you're not willing to meet me at $134, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other offers.
